extension.description: Addon for Kodi to launch Playnite. Playnite is an open source video game library manager with one simple goal: To provide a unified interface for all of your games. To install Playnite, go to https://playnite.link/download.html. This work is forked from BrosMakingSoftware/Kodi-Launches-Steam-Addon

Addon para que Kodi lance Playnite. Playnite es un gestor de bibliotecas de videojuegos de código abierto con un objetivo simple: proporcionar una interfaz unificada para todos tus juegos. Para instalar Playnite, vaya a https://playnite.link/download.html. Este trabajo es una modificación de BrosMakingSoftware/Kodi-Launches-Steam-Addon
